Gift codes
To redeem a gift code, you can open Market > Redeem and enter the code then click Redeem.
Props
There are some props that you can interact with, such as the Harp or the Drums. Why not try them out?
Morph
If you are on mobile, the Properties will be hidden. To show them, just tap the button on the right that says Properties
Props
To ensure safety, some props may require a specific RP Rank to purchase. So, why not start roleplaying to gain EXP?
Memberships
Show us your support by purchasing our Membership tiers in the Market! You can also donate to us via Robux.
Morph
To change your image size, roleplay name, and more, go to the Properties section of the Morph screen. If you’re on Mobile, that panel is hidden. Click on Properties on the right to show them.
Roleplay EXP
To increase your RP Rank, you need Roleplay EXP. You can earn Roleplay EXP by just staying in the experience, or talking in the chat!
Gift codes
Join our official community server for gift codes as we post them occasionally!
Feedback
Got any issues or concerns about 2D Image Roleplay? Use the Feedback feature!
Settings
Is your device running slow? Try lowering/disabling the graphics options in the Settings.
Maps
You can travel to different maps by going into one of the portals, or opening the Map.
Community Server
Want to discuss 2D Image Roleplay, and learn what comes next? Join our official Discord server!
Restricted Images
If you are about to morph into an image that is unsafe for children, be sure to enable Restrict from users <13 in the Properties panel.
Restricted Images
If you forget to restrict your image containing content that’s unsafe for children, you will have a chance of getting banned permanently.
